snippet: Home runs from Russell Martin, Steve Pearce and Alex Rodriguez accounted for all but one of the Yankees’ runs as they again moved a game ahead of Baltimore in the American League East race.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Baltimore Orioles, 8-5, to regain first place in the American League East.
lead_paragraph: Home runs from Russell Martin, Steve Pearce and Alex Rodriguez accounted for all but one of the Yankees’ runs as they again moved a game ahead of Baltimore in the American League East race.

headline.seo: Yankees, Behind Three Homers, Knock Orioles Back Down to Second Place
headline.main: Yanks, Behind Three Homers, Knock Orioles Back Down
headline.print_headline: Yanks, Behind Three Homers, Knock Orioles Back Down
